text: Khagendra Jamatia (c. 1954 – 2 March 2018) was an Indian politician. A member of the Communist Party of India (Marxist) since 1983, Jamatia first represented the party while standing in the 1988 Tripura Legislative Assembly elections. He subsequently won reelection five consecutive times through 2013, and was again backed by the CPM in the 2018 election cycle. During his campaign, Jamatia was diagnosed with cancer, and died in the All India Institute of Medical Sciences in New Delhi on 2 March 2018, aged 64. ==References== Category:1950s births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from cancer in India Category:Members of the Tripura Legislative Assembly Category:State cabinet ministers of Tripura Category:Communist Party of India (Marxist) politicians from Tripura Category:Tripuri people Category:Tripura politicians Category:People from Tripura
title: Khagendra Jamatia
